definition: a vehicle carrying many passengers, to teach and supervise someone
details:
noun
- a vehicle carrying many passengers
= synonyms: bus
- a carriage pulled by four horses with one driver
= synonyms: four-in-hand, coach-and-four
- a railcar where passengers ride
= synonyms: carriage
- a person who gives private instruction (as in singing, acting, etc.)
= synonyms: private instructor, tutor
- (sports) someone in charge of training an athlete or a team
= synonyms: manager, handler
verb
- to teach and supervise someone
= example: to teach and supervise someone
= synonyms: train
- to drive a coach
